summary: I OWN A 1995 S10 (4X4) PICK UP. I PURCHASED THIS VEHICLE NEW IN 1994. I HAD TO REPLACED THE REMOTE OIL FILTER LINES 3 TIMES!!! MY THIRD SET IS CURRENTLY LEAKING. THE REMOTE OIL FILTER LINES FAIL WHERE THE RUBBER HOSE IS CRIMPED TO THE ALUMINUM TUBING. THIS IS A VERY POOR DESIGN. APPARENTLY, CHEVY DOESN'T ACKNOWLEDGE THE PROBLEM.
